modName: God of War - Blade of Olympus
summary: Are you worthy of wielding the Blade of the Gods?
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/NKkCm.png[/img]
This mod adds a craftable [size=3][b][color=#f4a460]\'Blade of Olympus\'[/color][/b][/size] to the game of Skyrim

[url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/598349-blade-of-olympus-from-god-of-war-3-or-iii]- Original Request Thread -[/url]


[size=4][b]- v1.0 -[/b][/size]
[youtube]_ZuJhKaujyc[/youtube]
[/center]
[b][/b]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/Brwj4.png[/img]
You can craft the Blade using any Forge under the \'Daedric\' section.

To craft the [b]\'Blade of Olympus\'[/b], you will need:
[list][*] 1 Daedra Heart
[*] 3 Moonstone Ingot
[*] 5 Gold Ingot
[/list]


[center]The only thing I don\'t like about this thing is the texture. I despise texturing with a passion...[/center]



[img]http://i.imgur.com/iZy5l.png[/img]
[list][*] Download with Nexus Mod Manager and make sure its checked under the Mods tab.
[*] Or download manualy and extract to your \\Data folder in your Skyrim directory. Then make sure the \'Blade_of_Olympus.esp\' file is active in the Data section of your SkyrimLauncher.exe.
[/list]



[img]http://i.imgur.com/JJ6mB.png[/img]
[u][b]v1.0[/b][/u]
- Initial release 
- Adds craftable [b]\'Blade of Olympus\'[/b] to the game




[center]
[size=4]
[b][color=#f4a460].:[/color] If you like this, then you might like these [color=#f4a460]:.[/color][/b][/size]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12322][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Mf9MY.png[/IMG][/url][/center]
